data.title: AOK Digital Media Lab
data.meta_description: Learn about the Digital Media Lab, a creation space that provides access to audio and video recording equipment as well as recording spaces, specialized software, and equipment for in-house, self-serve use.
data.text:
Canon EOS Rebel T8i Camera is a versatile DSLR that features a 24.1 MP APS-C format CMOS sensor and DIGIC 8 image processor that supports high-resolution stills and UHD 4K video recording up to 24fps, as well as Full HD and HD recording. Its wide ISO 100-25600 sensitivity range suits a variety of lighting conditions. The camera circulates in a durable bag that includes an EF-S 18-55mm f/4-5.6 IS STM lens, attached UV filter and lens cap holder, 32GB SD card, rechargeable battery, wireless remote, and instruction manual.

2 DSLR Cameras are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Canon EOS Rebel T7i Camera uses a 24.2 MP APS-C CMOS sensor and DIGIC 7 image processor to capture high-resolution stills and video with an expanded sensitivity range of ISO 100-51200 to suit working in a wide variety of lighting conditions. The T7i also supports Full HD 1080p video recording at up to 60 fps in the MP4 format with IPB compression or 30 fps in the MOV format with ALL-I compression. The camera circulates in a durable bag with an EF-S 18-55mm f/4-5.6 IS STM lens, a 16GB SD card, attached UV filter and lens cap holder, rechargeable battery, selfie trigger, and an instruction manual.

3 DSLR Cameras are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Canon EOS RT7 Camera is an entry-level DSLR with a 24.1 MP APS-C CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4+ image processor to capture high-resolution stills with a range of ISO 100-6400 for working in a variety of lighting conditions. The RT7 also supports Full HD 1080/30p video recording. The camera circulates in a durable bag with an EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II lens, a 16GB SD card, attached UV filter and lens cap holder, rechargeable battery, wired remote, and a basic instruction manual. Note: this camera does not support external microphones.

3 DSLR Cameras are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Canon Rebel T3i DSLR Camera includes an 18 megapixel sensor allowing it to capture beautiful, high resolution JPEG, RAW, and RAW+JPEG images and also records full-HD video at 1920x1080/30p/24p, among other frame-rate options. The T3i kit also features a top-loading camera bag designed for DSLRs, a 16GB SD card, attached UV filter and lens cap holder, rechargeable battery, the necessary cords/cables and our Quick-Start Guide and instruction manual.

8 DSLR Cameras are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Quick-Start Guide

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Nikon D3000 Digital Camera includes a 10.2 megapixel DX sensor that captures photos in RAW and JPEG formats. It comes with the versatile 3x 18-55mm Zoom-Nikkor lens with VR image stabilization and speedy 11-point autofocusing. The D3000 kit features a durable camera bag, a 16GB SD card, attached UV filter and lens cap holder, rechargeable battery, USB cable, and an instruction manual.

5 DSLR Cameras are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Canon VIXIA HD Camcorder features a 3.28 megapixel censor and records full-HD 1920x1080p video directly to an SD card. The HF R400 also employs a genuine Canon HD video lens with 53x Advanced Zoom and SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization with improved Dynamic Image Stabilization. For easy recording and instant playback, there's a 3" touch panel LCD as well. Included in the kit is a 32GB SD card, the necessary cables/cords and our Quick-Start Guide and instruction manual.

5 HD Camcorders are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Quick-Start Guide

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Manfrotto MKC3-H01 Tripod is designed for those times when space and weight are of primary concern. People on-the-go will appreciate this featherweight 2.54 lb five section tripod which supports up 3.31 lb and rises to a height of 5.05' with the column extended, while breaking down to only 18” to fit easily in your bag. Leg angles can be lengthened or shortened quickly via the flip lever leg locks. The integrated quick release grip head has a large ergonomic, locking, fast-action handle a front tilt of 0° / +90°, a lateral tilt of -90° / +90° and a panning range of 360°.

8 Tripods are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Vello ActionPan Stabilizing Grip allows you to hold your camera down low when filming and features a shock-proof rubber handle that offers a comfortable, secure grip. yThe non-slip rubber rails secure your camera in a variety of positions.

3 Tripods are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Joby GorillaPod has legs made up of several joints that allow you to wrap it around objects and adapt it for use in uneven ground. With a load capacity of 6.6 lb, it can reliably hold most camcorders, DSLRs, and portable lights.

2 Tripods are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

The Raya Flexible Tabletop Stand holds a smartphone or webcam to provide hands-free use during video meetings. It features a flexible neck with a ¼”-20 screw that is compatible with most smartphone adapters, webcams, microphones, and compact LED lights.

3 Tabletop Stands are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

The Revo SR-1000 Shoulder Mount is designed for the run-and-gun style of video shooting and enables smoother camera movements than are otherwise possible with a handheld setup. Weighing just 2.25 lb, the SR-1000's lightweight, ergonomic design helps reduce fatigue for prolonged use. The rig supports a maximum capacity of up to 5.5 lb, which is suitable for DSLRs, mirrorless cameras, and small to mid-sized camcorders.

4 Shoulder Mounts are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

ZOOM H4n Recorder features true X/Y stereo mics with selectable recording patterns. It can record up to 4 channels of audio, with rates up to 24-bit/96kHz. XLR/TRS combo inputs let you connect a variety of gear. The recorder also features a built-in speaker and a 3.5mm output for connecting external speakers. A USB 2.0 port makes it easy to transfer files to a Mac or PC, or use the H4n as a live audio interface. It has a backlit LCD for easy control, and can operate on AA batteries, USB power, or wall power for versatility. The kit includes a 16GB SD card, batteries, the necessary cables/cords, stand adapter, windshield and our Quick-Start Guide and instruction manual.

5 ZOOM Recorders are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Quick-Start Guide

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

Sony ECM-44B Lavalier Microphone makes the exceptional quality of Sony's electric condenser microphones available for budget conscious productions, and a variety of sound reinforcement requirements, such as lectures and demonstrations. Measuring only 8.5 x 14.5mm, the ECM-44B reduces the visual distraction to the audience. The ECM-44B can be depended upon for clean, bright, yet natural reproduction. To maintain its low cost, this microphone operates on a single AA (does not accept phantom power) battery for over 5000 hours of service.

5 Lavalier Mics are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Quick-Start Guide

Read the Instruction Manual (PDF)

BOYA BY-M1 Omnidirectional Lavalier Microphone is compatible with smartphones, DSLR cameras, camcorders, audio recorders, and personal computers. The omnidirectional pickup pattern is equipped with full, 360-degree coverage and its internal battery can be switched off when used with a smartphone. The cable is 20’ and the microphone comes with a clip and foam windscreen.

2 Microphones available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Movo PM10 Lavalier Clip-on Microphone is an extremely lightweight and portable lavalier microphone that provides clear and accurate voice reproduction. Its newscaster-style design includes an effective omnidirectional pickup pattern that performs much better than most built-in microphones. It is compatible with the Apple iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, and Windows smartphones. Included with the microphone is a windscreen and tie clip.

2 Movo Mics are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Rode VideoMic GO On-Camera Shotgun Microphone is a lightweight microphone that adds high-quality audio recording to your small camcorder and DSLR camera. It features an integrated shock mount and offers battery-free operation, using instead the plug-in power from your camera’s 3.5mm microphone input. The microphone circulates with a DeadCat windshield and connection cord.

Read the Quick-Start Guide

3 Shotgun Mics are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Tascam DR-10L Audio Recorder with Lavalier Mic is an ultra-compact digital recorder and lavalier microphone combo with a screw-down locking connector. It can be used for both the creative filmmaker and the busy videographer, and is also suitable for location recordings such as live events, and more. Featuring 24-bit mono and 48 kHz BWAV (Broadcast Wav) file format, it records up to 32GB on microSD or microSDHC media. There is a 1/8" headphone-output jack for easy monitoring of recordings and the recorder runs on a single AAA battery, which records up to 10 hours.

2 Tascam Recorders are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual [PDF]

GoPro HERO4 Silver has a built-in touchscreen LCD for composing shots and accessing the menu and is able to capture Full HD 1080p at up to 60 fps and - for even more detailed shots - capture 2.7K (2704 x 1520) at 30 fps and 4K (3840 x 2160) at 15 fps. It can also take 12-megapixel stills, as individual shots, in intervals for stitching together time-lapse movies, or in momentary bursts of up to 30 photos per second. Included with the camera is a chest mount, clip mount, and 3-way mount that can be used as a tripod or a selfie stick.

8 GoPro Silvers are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Quick-Start Guide

The JOBY GripTight Phone Mount allows you to mount your smartphone to standard 1/4"-20 thread tripods, letting you capture photos and video using its camera. With your smartphone securely mounted, you can also watch videos or other media hands-free. The GripTight PRO fits smartphones 2.2 to 3.9" wide, with or without a case attached. The mount has overmolded stainless steel plates that slide and lock for a precise fit. It holds your device in portrait or landscape mode and its angle of tilt can be adjusted. TPE grip pads secure it in place.

3 Phone Mounts are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Aaxa P300 Pico Projectors are palm-sized projectors that come in at 1.4lbs and can project media up to 80 inches in size. Plug it into a PC or use a USB drive and present slide presentations, photos and videos. For video playback, we suggest plugging the projector into a PC. The included remote allows you to control the projector from across the room (especially helpful for presentations and photo slideshows). Note: with the included cables, this projector does not connect to Apple products.

5 Portable Projectors are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual [PDF]

Genaray Powerbank 6A Pocket LED Light is a small yet powerful variable-color temperature light with output from 3200 to 5600K adjustable in 100K steps that's suitable for use in interior, exterior, and mixed lighting conditions. The light also features dimming from 100 to 10% brightness and a boost mode that increases the output to 130% for one minute. It comes with a mini-tripod, cell phone mount, ball joint adapter, attached diffusion filter, and charging cable.

2 LED Lights available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual. [PDF]

Portable USB Conference Microphone is a compact microphone designed to improve the audio quality of voice over internet applications like iChat and Skype. It comes with a USB cable for easy plug-and-play connectivity with Mac and Windows computers. Please note: the USB cable only works for 1.0 or 2.0 ports.

2 Conference Mics are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Transcription Foot Pedal is designed for common digital transcription applications and uses a USB interface to connect to your Windows or Macintosh computer. See the product description for a list of compatible programs.

Read the product description.

Foot Pedals available on first-come, first-served basis

SanDisk Extreme Pro UHS-I SD Card is designed for Full HD, 3D, and 4k video devices and features a speed class rating of V30, which guarantees minimum write speeds of 30 MB/s; it also supports minimum write speeds of 10 MB/s. Read speeds are supported up to 100 MB/s and write speeds max out at 90 MB/s. The SD card circulates in a protective case and bag.

4 Extra SD Cards are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

LG Portable USB DVD Drive allows you to read and write on DVDs and CDs with your computer. This drive connects to your Windows or Mac computer via USB 2.0 ports. It features 8x DVD and 24x CD read and write speeds. It uses Silent Play technology that automatically adjusts the read speed to reduce background noise during playback.

5 DVD Player/Writers are available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Read the Instruction Manual [PDF]

Sony Digital Voice Recorder has an onboard microphone and 4GB of internal memory that allows you to record 39-159 hours of audio in mono MP3 with a variety of settings. The USB adapter attaches to a computer for easy file transfer. It comes with two rechargeable AAA batteries and an abbreviated instruction manual.

2 Recorders available on a first-come, first-served basis.
